bufferStream.js

'use strict';

/**
 * @module bufferStream
 */

/* Wraps a buffer in a stream interface */

var Readable = require('stream').Readable;
var util = require('util');

/**
 * @class
 * @param {Object} data Data.
 * @param {Object} opt Options.
 */
function BufferStream(data, opt) {
    Readable.call(this, opt);
    this.buffer = data;
    this.done = false;
}

util.inherits(BufferStream, Readable);

/**
 * Read data.
 */
BufferStream.prototype._read = function() {
    if (this.done) {
      this.push(null);
      return;
    }
    this.push(this.buffer);
    this.done = true;
};

module.exports = {
  BufferStream: BufferStream
};

Documentation generated at Wed Oct 07 2015 14:26:31 GMT-0700 (PDT)
